Token.Abstract: Constants indicating the speed that the crop region scales (the resulting video zooms) when the leveling algorithm uses HVTLevelerCropModeFlex mode.

The scale speed will be slow. This slows down the zoom effect and produces a smoother result.
A low-pass filter is used internally to smoothen out the change of scale.
You can change its frequency by providing a settings NSDictionary at the HVTSDK class method activateWithAPIKey:settings: using the key HVTScaleFilterFrequencySettingsKey.
The scale speed will be more responsive. This results to a faster but more unsteady zoom effect.
